name: Domain Defense VR
description: Domain Defense VR is a stand alone game that has been built from the ground up for virtual reality. This tabletop style tower defense game will have you defending each unique level against waves of enemies and bosses with an arsenal of towers and special abilities.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 or Equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Intel Core i5 or Equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 980 or 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
